name: Old Town Trolley Tours
description: The original Old Town Trolley Tours was conceived right here in Key West. It was more than 25 years ago when the three founders of Historic Tours got together to work towards preserving the historic sites of the city and along the way, created an exciting and entertaining sightseeing tour.  Old Town Trolley Tours of Key West offers a comfortable seat, a humorous and interesting narrative and a way to see the best of the city at your own pace.
